Text: thanks.  great stuff.  Saw them the other night at HOB in Houston.  Short set, but very good.  They also played Like a Prayer (Madonna) and Flight of Icarus (Iron Maiden).  They were much better than the headliner, HIM, imho...  I think Valo just doesn't have much voice left and he was just buried in the mix much of the time.  These guys though...  go see them live when they come to your town!!!  especially if they headline their own show...
